cu.explanation_en: Setting drb_ciphering to an invalid enum value 'invalid' will cause configuration validation errors during startup, preventing the CU from initializing properly.

du.explanation_en: Setting global_log_level to an invalid enum value 'invalid' will cause logging configuration errors, potentially leading to application startup failures or undefined logging behavior.
du.explanation_zh: 將 global_log_level 設定為無效的枚舉值 'invalid' 會導致日誌配置錯誤，可能造成應用程式啟動失敗或未定義的日誌行為。
